title: Can't log in
body:
So no matter what i do i cant log in i keep getting the message Connection Failure:Unable to connect to pvp.net server.  I tried reinstalling the game, making sure internet explorer is up to date, disabled peer to peer  and many other things. I'm using windows 10 anybody have any ideas????????

HELP PLZ.{{champion:223}}

replies.body: Check out the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Try all the steps you haven't already, such as configuring your port forwarding or temporarily disabling your firewall. Let me know if anything helps. You might also try running the game as administrator as outlined on the [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) page.
I've tried all the steps and nothing is working it is probably worth mentioning that when i fail to log in the client crashes.
Have you tried [running the game as an administrator](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq4), or launching the **lol.launcher.admin** instead?
Are you using a mobile internet connection such a a mobile broadband usb?
Make sure you try everything listed [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). If that doesn't work then contact Riot support.
Yea im going to send them a ticket nothing is working thanks for your help anyway.{{summoner:31}}
